TextBlock.Text: DAZ: Phlox, after you complete this next memory statue, I would deeply appreciate if you could deliver more projection stone templates soon to the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> upstairs!
PHLOX: I would be more than happy to, Daz! But what happened to the stack I delivered just recently? Surely you haven't burned through all of them already!
DAZ: I'm afraid I have! The voyager stone's development is nearing completion; I require more templates to test more projection locations before I can be confident in its use.
DAZ: You should pair with a memory statue to test the voyager stones sometime as well, Phlox!
PHLOX: I was not aware I needed to be paired to a memory statue to use the voyager stones! Is there a reason for this prerequisite?
DAZ: Ah, you see, the voyager stones use the same memory storage systems as the memory statues to record and transmit experiences from the projection pool back to the individual.
DAZ: That is how the voyager stone allows one to explore remotely beyond a projection pool!
DAZ: Without the individual being first paired to a memory statue, I'm afraid the voyager stone would be little more than any ordinary projection stone in function!
